block.p: BASEBALL

AMERICAN LEAGUE DETROIT TIGERS--Named Glenn Ezell manager of Toledo of the International League. NEW YORK YANKEES--Placed RHP Roger Clemens on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Darrell Einertson from Columbus of the International League. SEATTLE MARINERS--Placed C Dan Wilson on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled C Joe Oliver from Tacoma of the PCL.

NATIONAL LEAGUE ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Activated RHP Todd Stottlemyre from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned OF Turner Ward to Tucson of the PCL. FLORIDA MARLINS--Signed RHP Phillips Akens, OF Anthony Brewer, 2B David Easterday, 1B Daniel Hicks, LHP Robert Jones, OF James Kavourias, LHP Christopher Key, 1B Patrick Magness, RHP Matt Massingale, RHP Michael McNutt, C Brian Rogers, RHP Steve Sawyer, LHP Timothy Schilling, RHP Brandon Sloan, 1B William Smith, RHP Adam Sterrett, INF-OF Jeffrey Stevens and SS Josh Willingham. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Placed RHP Jason Boyd on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Steve Schrenk from Scranton-Wilkes-Barre of the International League. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Placed LHP Scott Sauerbeck on the 15-day disabled list.
INTERNATIONAL LEAGUE INDIANAPOLIS INDIANS--Promoted OF Chad Green from Huntsville of the Southern League.

CALIFORNIA LEAGUE SAN JOSE GIANTS--Placed C Bob Niemet on the voluntary retired list. Recalled C Domingo Ramirez from extended spring training. FLORIDA STATE LEAGUE JUPITER HAMMERHEADS--Assigned LHP Luke Lockwood to Vermont of the New York-Penn League. MIDWEST LEAGUE
BASKETBALL
National Basketball Association SEATTLE SUPERSONICS--Announced the retirement of Frank Furtado, athletic trainer. Named Mike Shimensky athletic trainer.

United States Basketball League PENNSYLVANIA VALLEYDAWGS--Placed G Tony Rutland and G Donnie Carr on the inactive list. Signed F Artemus McClary. FLORIDA SEA DRAGONS--Activated G James Blackwell, G Keweemada King and G Mark Jones from the inactive list. Placed F Ajani Williams, C-F Mohamed Woni and G Brian Green on the inactive list. LONG ISLAND SURF--Placed G Dawan Allison on the inactive list. Signed G Patrick Collins.
Women's National Basketball Association CHARLOTTE STING--Activated F Shalonda Enis from injured list. Placed G Niesa Johnson on injured list.

FOOTBALL National Football League ARIZONA CARDINALS--Signed TE Jay Tant, to a three-year contract. BALTIMORE RAVENS--Signed LB O.J. Brigance. Agreed to terms with DT Cedric Woodard on a three-year contract. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed NT Steve Warren to a multiyear contract. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Signed CB Isaac Harvin. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Released OL James Brown and WR Tony Bown. MINNESOTA VIKINGS--Signed CB Roderick Mullen to a one-year contract. TENNESSEE TITANS--Signed Jeff Fisher, coach, to a three-year contract extension.
HOCKEY

NATIONAL HOCKEY LEAGUE ATLANTA THRASHERS--Announced C Ray Ferraro has exercised his option and will return for the 2000-01 season. Agreed to terms with D Mike Weaver. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Announced an affiliation agreement with Dayton of the East Coast Hockey League.
OLYMPICS
USA BASKETBALL--Announced Grant Hill has withdrawn from the 2000 USA Basketball men's senior national team.
SOCCER
MAJOR LEAGUE SOCCER DALLAS BURN--Announced the retirement of MF Brian Haynes. Signed MF-F Michael Burke.

COLLEGE NCAA--Suspended Clemson OF Casey Stone for his next NCAA postseason game for his role in a pushing match after a College World Series game against Louisiana-Lafayette on June 15. ARKANSAS--Named Gabe Warner administrative assistant for basketball. CORNELL, IOWA--Named Curt Heideman wrestling coach. EAST STROUDSBURG--Named Joy Richman athletic director. ERSKINE--Named Tom Creola softball coach. FLORIDA--Named Renee Ladner women's assistant basketball coach. HOFSTRA--Named Elizabeth O'Brien women's assistant basketball coach. LONG BEACH STATE--Named Dana Colligan Gutierrez assistant track and field coach. LONG ISLAND U.--Announced the resignation of Tony Bozella, women's basketball coach, from the Southampton College campus, to take the same position at the Brooklyn campus. MISSISSIPPI--Announced the resignation of John Ishee, women's assistant basketball coach. NORTH CAROLINA-GREENSBORO--Named Jason Tuggle women's interim second assistant basketball coach. OKLAHOMA CITY--Promoted Janell Jones to women's basketball coach. WENTWORTH--Announced the resignation of Aaron Koproski, men's lacrosse coach. WIDENER--Named Diana Felker, volleyball coach, and Jamie Steele, men's lacrosse coach. WITTENBERG--Named Kelly Cummings defensive coordinator.
